item.title: Call Stack for Beginners - Part 1
item.description: Every process, no matter how it came into being, has at least one stack for the purpose of running itself. The programming language can be anything but it needs a stack to run. As usual is the custom we will write a c program to explain the concepts in a more detail. Before that we will have a basic understanding of why a stack is used and whatâ€™s its purpose (If you are really new to this world, then you should see what is stack first).
